history.proof: intros a b v. unfold ex_RInt. exists v. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing a, b : R v : V P : V -> Prop Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball (scal (?M2370 - ?M2369) ?M2371) eps y -> P y" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball v eps y -> P y".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: NormedModule R_AbsRing

Goal:
forall (a b : R) (v : V), ex_RInt (fun _ : R => v) a b

Premises:
ex_RInt = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => exists If : V, is_RInt f a b If : (R -> V) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
*** [ R : Set ]
is_RInt_const : forall (a b : R) (v : V), is_RInt (fun _ : R => v) a b (scal (b - a) v)
ex_RInt_swap : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt f b a
is_RInt_swap : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V), is_RInt f b a If -> is_RInt f a b (opp If)
Riemann_sum_const : forall (v : ?V) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum (fun _ : R => v) ptd = scal (last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) - SF_h ptd) v where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
ex_RInt_ext : forall (f g : R -> V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt g a b
is_RInt_ext : forall (f g : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> is_RInt f a b l -> is_RInt g a b l
ex_RInt_ub : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> exists M : R, forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> norm (f t) <= M
ex_RInt_point : forall (f : R -> V) (a : R), ex_RInt f a a
bounded_continuity : forall (f : R -> ?V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> filterlim f (locally x) (locally (f x))) -> {M : R | forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> norm (f x) < M} where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
Rabs_triang : forall a b : R, Rabs (a + b) <= Rabs a + Rabs b
filterlim_const : forall a : ?U, filterlim (fun _ : ?T => a) ?F (locally a) where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- UniformSpace] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
is_RInt = fun (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V) => filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally If) : (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
scal_distr_l : forall (x : ?K) (u v : ?V), scal x (plus u v) = plus (scal x u) (scal x v) where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Ring] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace ?K]
Riemann_fine = fun a b : R => within (fun ptd : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b) (locally_dist (fun ptd : SF_seq => seq_step (SF_lx ptd))) : R -> R -> (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope]
is_RInt_point : forall (f : R -> V) (a : R), is_RInt f a a zero
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a
Rlt_Rminus : forall a b : R, a < b -> 0 < b - a
Rlt_minus_r : forall a b c : R, a < b - c < -> a + c < b
sign_min_max : forall a b : R, sign (b - a) * (Rmax a b - Rmin a b) = b - a
filterlim_scal_r : forall (k : ?K) (x : ?V), filterlim (fun z : ?V => scal k z) (locally x) (locally (scal k x)) where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
Rlt_div_r : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a * c < b < -> a < b / c
filterlim_locally_ball_norm : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball_norm y eps (f x))) where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f x))) where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- UniformSpace] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
ball_norm = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (x : V) (eps : R) (y : V) => norm (minus y x) < eps : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), V -> R -> V -> Prop Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ R_scope _]
foldr = fun (T R : Type) (f : T -> R -> R) (z0 : R) => fix foldr (s : seq T) : R := match s with | [::] => z0 | x :: s' => f x (foldr s') end : forall T R : Type, (T -> R -> R) -> R -> seq T -> R Arguments T, R are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]
Riemann_sum_cons : forall (f : R -> ?V) (h0 : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum f (SF_cons h0 ptd) = plus (scal (SF_h ptd - fst h0) (f (snd h0))) (Riemann_sum f ptd) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
norm_ge_0 : forall x : ?V, 0 <= norm x where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
ball_norm_center : forall (x : ?V) (e : posreal), ball_norm x e x where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_opp : forall x : ?V, norm (opp x) = norm x where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
Riemann_sum_norm : forall (f : R -> ?V) (g : R -> R) (ptd : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv ptd -> (forall t : R, SF_h ptd <= t <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> norm (f t) <= g t) -> norm (Riemann_sum f ptd) <= Riemann_sum g ptd where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
scal_one : forall u : ?V, scal one u = u where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Ring] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_zero_r : forall x : ?K, scal x zero = zero where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Ring] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_zero_l : forall u : ?V, scal zero u = zero where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Ring] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace ?K]
norm_scal : forall (l : ?K) (x : ?V), norm (scal l x) <= abs l * norm x where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_triangle : forall x y : ?V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- NormedModule ?K]
scal_opp_one : forall u : ?V, scal (opp one) u = opp u where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Ring] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace ?K]
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> seq R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R
filterlim_ext : forall f g : ?T -> ?U, (forall x : ?T, f x = g x) -> filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?G where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Type] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Filter ?F]
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
scal_opp_r : forall (x : ?K) (u : ?V), scal x (opp u) = opp (scal x u) where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- Ring] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing |- ModuleSpace ?K]

```coq
intros a b v. unfold ex_RInt. exists v. apply is_RInt_const.
Qed.```
